summary: Project to build/redeploy an app with a responsive, modern, simple UI template.

existing_features.title: Apply a cohesive, responsive, modern, and simple visual theme across the entire frontend (login, header, dashboard, and all tabs) using Tailwind tokens/CSS variables, consistent typography, spacing, and elevation in both light and dark mode.

Ensure the app layout is fully responsive across common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop): improve the header branding block, dashboard tab navigation, and primary content containers so they adapt cleanly without overflow or cramped spacing.

Polish and simplify the UI composition of major content elements (cards, tables/lists, dialogs, forms, empty/loading states) to feel modern and consistent while keeping interactions and existing features unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Use a responsive, modern, simple template for the app UI.

projectName: Apply a responsive, modern, simple UI template across the app
